nodes.description: 2010年7月，Al-Shabaab在乌干达坎帕拉发动爆炸袭击，报复乌干达支持非洲联盟AMISOM部队。
nodes.support_text: In July 2010, Al-Shabaab also claimed responsibility for a bombing in Kampala, Uganda, in retaliation for Uganda's support to, and presence in, AMISOM.

nodes.description: 2011年夏季，东非干旱导致Somali地区食物短缺，迫使数万人逃往埃塞俄比亚和肯尼亚避难。
nodes.support_text: During the summer of 2011, the East African region faced a drought and shortage of food supplies, particularly in the Somali region, forcing tens of thousands of people to cross the borders into Ethiopia and Kenya for refuge.

nodes.description: 2011年8月，非洲联盟AMISOM部队干预Somali地区，迫使Al-Shabaab撤出该区域。
nodes.support_text: after an AMISOM intervention to bring aid to the country during a season of drought

nodes.description: 2011年10月4日，Al-Shabaab自杀式袭击摩加迪沙过渡联邦政府部-ministerial complex，造成100人死亡、110余人受伤。
nodes.support_text: The 2011 Mogadishu bombing occurred on 4 October 2011, when a suicide bomber drove a truck into the gate of the Transitional Federal Government's ministerial complex in Mogadishu, Somalia.

nodes.description: 2011年10月4日，Al-Shabaab在摩加迪沙南部和西部同时发动袭击。
nodes.support_text: On the same day, Al-Shabaab simultaneously launched attacks in the south and west of Somalia.

nodes.description: 爆炸后，土耳其外交部声明学生排队等待土耳其奖学金，并澄清事件经过。
nodes.support_text: Turkey, which also increased its involvement in Somalia with a pledge to re-open its embassy in Mogadishu, released a statement clarifying the events that took place.

nodes.description: 爆炸后，联合国、土耳其和白宫谴责袭击，呼吁保护平民。
nodes.support_text: it is incomprehensible that innocents are being senselessly targeted. The secretary-general is appalled by the vicious suicide bomb attack targeting government offices and ministries in Mogadishu today.

nodes.description: 爆炸后，Somali总统和官员谴责袭击，称其为懦夫行为。
nodes.support_text: I am extremely shocked and saddened by this cruel and inhumane act of violence against the most vulnerable in our society
Al-Shabaab threatened to expel aid groups

nodes.support_text: 袭击发生在安全检查站
